name: Adam in: Escape from paradise
description:
My first game, created with the great pocket-platformer from l0bster

On the first day, god created atmosphere.....blah, blah, blah. He also did a lot of other pretty unimpressive things. 

But in 2021, god made his best creation: The pocket platformer!
In this little game you can play Adams real story. Yes, everything you know about this is wrong. Adam was not banned from paradise. Adam did not eat the apple, and a talking snake? Come on....

Help Adam escape from paradise, where god sees everything. Everything. Everywhere. Like in the movie "the Truman show". God watches Adam eating, god watches Adam sleeping. God even watches Adam peeing! Adam can´t stand this any longer, so he decided to leave...

This game features

  • State of the art 8x8 high resolution graphics (yeah, better than my C64)
  • Deep plot with a twist
  • Pigs
  • God himself
  • An apple-cannon!
